title: In Kali's Shadow (CRS115)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that D.W. Baldwin first shared on the podcast in December of 2019 about a goddess of destruction… and creation.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK
